bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: ComputationGraph: nodes with no outgoing connections not detected in config
bug.description: Configuration where network contains vertices (that are not output layers) that don't have any outgoing connections don't seem to be detected currently, even though the network configuration is invalid.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
